item.title: CVE-2024-0900|2024-06-04T17:59:21.417Z -- elespare -- elespare%20%E2%80%93%20blog%2C%20magazine%20and%20newspaper%20addons%20for%20elementor%20with%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%2C%20and%20header%2Ffooter%20builder.%20one%20click%20import%3A%20no%20coding%20required%21
item.description: The Elespare â€“ Build Your Blog, News & Magazine Websites with Expert-Designed Template Kits. One Click Import: No Coding Skills Required! plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized post creation due to a missing capability check on the elespare_create_post() function hooked via AJAX in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to create arbitrary posts.
